message.content:
cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.MM, cs.IT. 

The paper deals with background subtraction in infrared imagery, which is a common problem in computer vision and image processing. The use of Gaussian mixture models and Bayesian inference suggests that the paper is likely to be categorized under computer vision (cs.CV) or machine learning (cs.LG, cs.AI). The use of an efficient and highly accurate updating mechanism suggests that the paper may also be relevant to multimedia (cs.MM) or information theory (cs.IT).
